name: AP_CLAIM_INFO_SVC_SP_NCCI
description: This field contains 1 to 3 procedure codes which, with another procedure code, elicits edits 3129 and/or 3130 (for CMS OCE/APC, Enhanced APG System, Medicare ASC and TRICARE OCE/APC) or elicitis edits 5129 and/or 5130 (for Professional Claims Editor).

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: SPR_NCCI
columns.description: This field contains 1 to 3 procedure codes which, with another procedure code, elicits edits 3129 and/or 3130 (for CMS OCE/APC, Enhanced APG System, Medicare ASC and TRICARE OCE/APC) or elicitis edits 5129 and/or 5130 (for  Professional Claims Editor).
